short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Title and Reference Information

* **Title (English)**: Windshield, Left-Hand (L/H)
* **Title (French)**: Pare-brise gauche
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01027309
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237545/A

### Procurement Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Date**: February 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 9, 2023, 14:00
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact**: Ryan Duncan, ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of Windshield L/H, as detailed below:

* **Item Number**: 1
* **GSIN**: 1560
* **Part Number**: 370-403-00
* **NCAGE**: F0360
* **Quantity**: 10 units, each
* **Unit of Issue**: Each
* **Delivery Location**: 25 CFSD Montreal, Free Carrier

Proposals for equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified, with the proposed part number and NCAGE indicated.

### Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada and can be accessed through the CanadaBuys website.

### Attachments

English language document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/4004cd2a727b9b68e94087adda62c5ef/w8485-237545_rfp_eng.pdf
French language document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/1ded2ec5d7bafedb72abf6d157097270/w8485-237545_rfp_fr.pdf
Link to submission documents and instructions: [insert URL]
```
